Tests exception message contains stack with correct function name.

function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:12 Uncaught Error
foo.displayName @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:12
bar.displayName @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:18
baz.function.name @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:23
setTimeout (async)
(anonymous) @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:30
